verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Inua macho yako,
utazame pande zote
(za dunia)
wote wanakusanya
na wanakujia wewe). x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Wana wako watakuja
wakitoka mbali,
na wale binti zao wote
watabebwa nyongani.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Ndipo utakapoona
na kutiwa nuru,
na moyo utatetemeka
na kububujika.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Wote watakurithia
wakitoka Sheba,
dhabihu pia na
uvumba vitatolewa.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Watakutolea hizo
tunu zote safi,
na pia watazitangaza
sifa zako ee Bwana.
